about.title: About Chef Valerio
about.bio1: Born in Rio de Janeiro and trained in the finest culinary schools of SÃ£o Paulo, Chef Valerio Carlos brings the vibrant flavors of Brazil to the sophisticated palates of Paris. With over 15 years of experience in prestigious restaurants across South America and Europe, he now offers exclusive catering and private chef services in Paris.
about.bio2: His cuisine is a unique fusion of traditional Brazilian recipes and French culinary techniques, creating an unforgettable dining experience that tells a story with every dish.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Bringing exceptional culinary experiences to your special moments

private.title: Private Chef Experience
private.description: Enjoy restaurant-quality dining in the comfort of your home. Custom menus tailored to your preferences and dietary requirements.

catering.title: Event Catering
catering.description: From intimate gatherings to large celebrations, we provide full-service catering with impeccable attention to detail.
